title: KIM SWITCH / SPOKE TO SPEEDFREAKS
description: Speedfreaks FM confirmed that the kids heard the Speedfreaks. He doesn't know what that means or how it relates to your case, but suggests you go back to the FELD Mural.

dialogueTree.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Let's start from the top.""

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You humiliated me. I don't care wh..."
links.text: "You humiliated me. I don't care what your political beliefs are, but you painted me with the same brush. Publicly."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I have been defamed over *live rad..."
links.text: "I have been defamed over *live radio*. That has never happened to me before. And it *never* will again."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""If you ever dare do anything like..."
links.text: "If you ever dare do anything like that again -- even close to it -- I will have you sanctioned. That was abhorrent."

links.title: Volition: "This hurts. It should. Apologize an..."
links.text: This hurts. It should. Apologize and try to make it right.

links.title: You: ""I fucked up. I'm sorry. Can I make..."
links.text: "I fucked up. I'm sorry. Can I make it up to you?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No, officer. Short of undoing it,..."
links.text: "No, officer. Short of undoing it, there's nothing. Let's just finish this case."

links.title: Volition: "The road to healing is going to be..."
links.text: The road to healing is going to be a long one. Stay the course. You will make it, some day.

links.title: You: ""I just said what was in my heart...."
links.text: "I just said what was in my heart. I can't apologize for passion."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You don't surprise me anymore, off..."
links.text: "You don't surprise me anymore, officer." The lieutenant's gaze cuts through you. "Let's finish with this case. I want to be done with it, now."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""There's no doubt the twins heard S..."
links.text: "There's no doubt the twins heard Speedfreaks FM," he says, still tempering his anger. "I still don't know how, without a radio -- but they did."

links.title: You: "Say nothing."
links.text: Say nothing.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Let's finish this case." The lieut..."
links.text: "Let's finish this case." The lieutenant shakes his head. "I want to be done with it, now."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""There's no doubt the twins heard S..."
links.text: "There's no doubt the twins heard Speedfreaks FM. I still don't know how, without a radio -- but they did."

links.title: You: ""Hold up, Kim. Aren't you going to..."
links.text: "Hold up, Kim. Aren't you going to say anything about meeting your radio heroes?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Nope.""
links.text: "Nope."

links.title: Authority: "The final word on this matter has b..."
links.text: The final word on this matter has been spoken.

links.title: You: ""Spooky shit. But what does it... m..."
links.text: "Spooky shit. But what does it... mean?" (Squint in thought.)

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I don't know what it means." The l..."
links.text: "I don't know what it means." The lieutenant's gaze travels toward the coast, toward the fishing village so far away.

links.title: You: ""I mean, a weird voice in *my* head..."
links.text: "I mean, a weird voice in *my* head said to talk to the kids. Maybe it's related?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I don't think the voices in your h..."
links.text: "I don't think the voices in your head are related to this, no."

links.title: You: ""But it didn't sound like one of my..."
links.text: "But it didn't sound like one of my thoughts. Sounded like a lady."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant gives you a long loo..."
links.text: The lieutenant gives you a long look.

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "Sincere worry, officer to officer...."
links.text: Sincere worry, officer to officer. He feels you need help and regrets that he doesn't know how to offer it.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I don't know what to say to that,..."
links.text: "I don't know what to say to that, or what you want me to say. I'm sorry."

links.title: You: ""Probably not. Sorry, Kim.""
links.text: "Probably not. Sorry, Kim."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Did we ask where the kids were whe..."
links.text: "Did we ask where the kids were when they heard the voice?" The wind picks up, blowing a stray strand of the lieutenant's hair out of place. He smooths it back.

links.title: You: ""I didn't. Sorry.""
links.text: "I didn't. Sorry."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No need to apologize. I was just g..."
links.text: "No need to apologize. I was just going to say it'd be a good idea to ask them."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""And, detective..." He turns to you..."
links.text: "And, detective..." He turns to you. He smiles. "Thanks for this. It's been interesting."

links.title: You: ""Are you criticizing me, Kim?""
links.text: "Are you criticizing me, Kim?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "He sighs. "No. I was just thinking..."
links.text: He sighs. "No. I was just thinking that it'd be a good idea to ask them."

links.title: You: ""Nope.""
links.text: "Nope."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""We could ask where the kids were w..."
links.text: "We could ask where the kids were when it happened."

links.title: You: ""Guess we're stuck then.""
links.text: "Guess we're stuck then."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant turns his attention..."
links.text: The lieutenant turns his attention away from the coast, back to you.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Not necessarily. We've learned som..."
links.text: "Not necessarily. We've learned something. No idea what. Something, at least."

links.title: You: ""We're not any closer to knowing *h..."
links.text: "We're not any closer to knowing *how* they heard it, though, are we?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No... We're not." The lieutenant's..."
links.text: "No... We're not." The lieutenant's gaze travels toward the coast, toward the fishing village so far away.
